intro.title: Intro
intro.welcome: Welcome to the Euro 2024 Betting Game!
intro.description: On this site, you can place bets for matches of the football euro 2024. It's totally free and you cannot actually win anything except for fame and glory. This site was designed as a competition: Who is the better forecaster for football matches? Compete with your friends and random people!
intro.my_bets_description: Set the number of goals for the home and away team for the next matches. You cannot place bets for any match that has started already.
intro.live_matches_description: Look at currently running matches. You can see all bets other users have placed.
intro.highscore_description: See how many points you have and how good you are compared to your friends and other users.

faq.who_made_this_answer: This site was made by me, Hans, a software engineer living in Munich.I made it for fun in my spare time for the UEFA Euro 2016. Six years ago, this site became refurbished and got some new features for the FIFA WorldCup 2018. For the Euro 2020 in 2021, the code has been put on a more modern base. In 2022, not much has changed for the FIFA WorldCup 2022. Feel free to contact me if you've got any questions or found a bug: hans.kirchner.info@gmail.com
faq.invite_friends_answer: Yes! You are free to invite your friends, colleagues and family to play here. If you feel proficient enough you can host this site on your own server (open-source on GitHub).
faq.penalty: Are goals from the penalty shoot-out included in the match result?
faq.penalty_answer: No. Only goals made during the 90+30 minutes (two halftimes + overtime) period of the match will be used as the match result.
faq.see_bets: Can I see the bets of other users?
faq.see_bets_answer: Yes and no. Yes, you can see bets of other users once a match has started or is finished. No, you can only see your own bets as long as the match has not yet started.
faq.new_features_answer:
Highlights:
  • Rescaled points from 0-1-2-3 to 0-2-3-4
  • Added match score factor
  • You can place bets for every match from the beginning (Round of 16, *-finals)
  • Notify users of matches without bets in navbar
  • Notify users of live matches
  • Notify users of unseen past matches
